ingredients.item: 400g pack essential Waitrose British Lean Turkey Breast & Thigh Mince

instructions.step: Mix the turkey mince with the breadcrumbs and half the chives, season and mould into 12 balls.
Bring the stock and soy to the boil in a large saucepan. Add the carrot, onion and turkey dumplings. Cover and cook for 10 minutes.
Add the courgette, sweetcorn and vermicelli, and cook for a further 5 minutes until the dumplings are cooked through with no pink meat. Stir in the remaining chives and serve.
